stimulusHtml: Which of the following is equal to  ∫ 0 π sin x   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4480@ ?
choicesHtml: ∫ − π 2 π 2 cos x   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@479C@

∫ 0 π cos x   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@447B@

∫ − π 0 sin x   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4525@

∫ − π 2 π 2 sin x   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47C0@

∫ π 2 π sin x   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45F7@
